about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Meet the company that protects your future
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide the highest level of insurance and reinsurance solutions, tailored to the unique needs of each client, with integrity and professionalism.
about.visionText: To become the recognized leader in the insurance industry through innovation, transparency, and unwavering dedication to customer satisfaction.
about.historyText1: Founded in 2003, InsurePro has grown from a small local agency to a regional leader in insurance and reinsurance. With over 20 years of experience, we have earned our reputation through dedication to innovation and customer satisfaction.
about.historyText2: Today, we serve thousands of satisfied clients and continue to expand our portfolio of products and services to meet the changing needs of the market.
about.teamSubtitle: Our partners with vast experience in insurance are dedicated to providing you with the best solutions
about.teamMember1Desc: Vast experience in insurance consulting and client relations
about.teamMember2Desc: Specialist in corporate insurance solutions and risk management

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We're ready to help with any question
contact.name: Full Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.faq1Q: How long does the insurance process take?
contact.faq1A: The process takes an average of 2-3 business days from signing the documents.
contact.faq2Q: What documents do I need to bring?
contact.faq2A: You need an ID card, proof of income, and proof of residence.
contact.faq3A: Yes! You can complete forms and sign digitally 100% online.
contact.faq4A: We accept bank transfer, card, and installment payments.
